page.title: 04HEALTH CARE AT AWRE
page.content: DR HOLLAND,THE BLAKENEY DOCTOR,HAS 2,700 PATIENTS ON HIS LIST AND COVERS A RADIUS OF 5 MILES. HIS CLOSE WORK WITH DR DUKES AT NEWNHAM MEANS HE CAN TAKE OFF MORE TIME THAN THE OLD COUNTRY DOCTORS. DR HOLLAND HAS BEEN COVERING AWRE FOR JUST OVER FIVE YEARS,AND CHOOSE THE AREA FOR HIS PRACTICE BECAUSE IT WAS STABLE AND A BEAUTIFUL AREA. HE HAD BECOME A DOCTOR AFTER 9 YEARS,FOUR YEARS WORKING IN A HOSPITAL. ALTHOUGH IT WAS A COUNTRY AREA,HE WANTED TO BUY NEW EQUIPMENT TO IMPROVE THE PRACTICE,TRYING TO INTRODUCE COMPUTERS FOR LISTING HIS PATIENTS PROBLEMS. HIS HOBBY THOUGH WAS A STUDY OF THE AREAS HISTORY;HE COLLECTS OLD PHOTOGRAPHS AND SHOWED US HOW AWRE LOOKED IN 1887.
